actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to limit the amount of political contributions which may be given to candidates for certain Federal offices.

summary.text: Provides that no person shall make contributions to the campaign of a candidate for nomination for election, or for election, to the office of Senator, Representative, Delegate, or Resident Commissioner which in the aggregate exceed $1000. Sets forth penalties for violation of this Act. Excludes contributions made by the national committees of a political party from the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to limit the amount of political contributions which may be given to candidates for certain Federal offices.
